name: Coastal Logistics Management, Inc.
description: Coastal Logistics Management, Inc. is a leading provider of integrated logistics solutions specializing in supply chain management, transportation, and warehousing services. Founded in 2010, the company has established itself as a vital partner for businesses seeking to optimize their logistics operations and improve efficiency. With a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, Coastal Logistics offers a wide range of services, including freight forwarding, customs brokerage, and last-mile delivery. The company's state-of-the-art technology platform provides real-time tracking and visibility, enabling clients to monitor their shipments and manage inventory effectively. Coastal Logistics also focuses on sustainability, employing eco-friendly practices in its operations to minimize environmental impact. With a team of experienced professionals, the company tailors solutions to meet the specific needs of various industries, including retail, manufacturing, and e-commerce. Coastal Logistics Management is dedicated to delivering exceptional service and value to its clients, helping them navigate the complexities of the modern supply chain.

seo.meta_title: Coastal Logistics Management, Inc. | Integrated Logistics Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Coastal Logistics Management, Inc., a leader in integrated logistics solutions specializing in supply chain management and transportation services.

faq.question: What services does Coastal Logistics offer?
faq.answer: Coastal Logistics offers freight forwarding, customs brokerage, last-mile delivery, and inventory management solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Coastal Logistics Management?
faq.answer: Jessica Thomas is the CEO of Coastal Logistics Management, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Coastal Logistics headquartered?
faq.answer: Coastal Logistics is headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida, USA.
